title: sfpowerkit pool config schema - tag mode
description: Config with script file and relaxing full IP range (tag mode)

expiry.description: Number of days after which the pooled scratch org will expire

config_file_path.description: (Required) Path to the scratch org definition file

relax_ip_ranges.description: Relax IP address ranges from which clients can access created scratch orgs.

max_allocation.description: (Required) Size of the pool, ignored if pool users are specified
